struct  SPI_Transaction_t
 A SPI_Transaction data structure is used with SPI_transfer(). It indicates how many SPI_FrameFormat frames are sent and received from the buffers pointed to txBuf and rxBuf. More...

Macros

#define SPI_CMD_RESERVED   32U
 
#define SPI_STATUS_RESERVED   (-32)
 
#define SPI_STATUS_SUCCESS   0
 Successful status code returned by SPI_control(). More...
 
#define SPI_EINVALCMD   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_SPI_BASE - 1)
 An error status code returned by SPI_control() for undefined command codes. More...
 
#define SPI_EINVAL   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_SPI_BASE - 2)
 An error code returned by SPI APIs for invalid input values.
 
#define SPI_ENOTIMPL   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_SPI_BASE - 3)
 An error code returned by SPI APIs for features not implemented.
 
#define SPI_EDMACONF   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_SPI_BASE - 4)
 An error code returned by SPI APIs for features not implemented.
 
#define SPI_CMD_LOOPBACK_ENABLE   (uint32_t)(SPI_CMD_RESERVED + 0)
 Command used by SPI_control to enable loopback.
 
#define SPI_CMD_SET_CLOCK_PHASEPOLARITY   (uint32_t)(SPI_CMD_RESERVED + 1)
 Command used by SPI_control to set Clock phase and polarity.
 
#define SPI_WAIT_FOREVER   0xFFFFFFFFU
 Wait forever define.
 
#define MIBSPI_RAM_MAX_ELEM   64U
 Maximum element in MibSPI RAM. For 8bit data size, the maximum transfer size is 64 bytes For 16bit data size, the maximum transfer size is 128 bytes.
 
#define MIBSPI_SLAVE_MAX   3U
 Max number of slaves supported when MibSPI is configured as master.

typedef enum SPI_TransferMode_e SPI_TransferMode
 SPI transfer mode determines the whether the SPI controller operates synchronously or asynchronously. In SPI_MODE_BLOCKING mode SPI_transfer() blocks code execution until the SPI transaction has completed. Only SPI_MODE_BLOCKING is supported.

Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* SPI_CallbackFxn) (SPI_Handle handle, SPI_Transaction *transaction)

The definition of a callback function used by the SPI driver Callback mode is not support.
